description: KEN BLANCHARD is the Chief Spiritual Officer of Ten Ken Blanchard Companies, a company that he and his wife, Dr. Marjorie Blanchard, founded in 1979. Ken co-authored The One Minute Manager® with Spencer Johnson, and the book has sold more than 13 million copies in 25 languages. A captivating and much sought-after speaker, he is co-founder of the Center for FaithWalk Leadership.
name: Ken Blanchard
